Posts.Content: Dec 28, 2008 12:28PM terri10 wrote: I am 58 (postmenapausal) & have been getting mammos for many years with no findings.  While I did not go for last 2-3 years, I just went to a new facility & provided my old mammos & now I am being called back for a diagnositic mammo because they see progressive calcification in my left breast.  My obgyn contacted me & gave me the name of a breast surgeon.  I have not found much online about progressive calcifications.   Does anyone have experience with progressive calcificaitons?  What can you tell  me about these findings & what can I expect.  Thank you...Terri.
Posts.Title: progressive calcifications terri10 leaf
